1.content:
Why did the lion king laugh at the fact that the mouse said that in the future it might be able to help the lion king?
$$choices
Because the mouse telling a wonderful story.
Because the lion king didn't think the little mouse would be able to save himself.
Because the mouse acting funny and scolded the lion.
Because the lion king thought that the little mouse would be able to save himself.

$$

2.content:
What is the moral idea of this story?
$$choices
Never underestimate anyone for being worthless. A small person may one day do great things.
Do not disturb people while sleeping as it may cause annoyance.
Don’t try to be someone you’re not. Instead, be content with who you are.
Those who pretend to be what they are not, sooner or later, fine themselves in deep water.

$$

3.content:
What are the synonyms of squirm?

complexion	
balmy	
swampy	
wriggle
$$
